courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs for beginners.

courses.title: Piano Mastery for Intermediate Players
courses.description: Enhance your piano skills with advanced techniques, scales, and classical pieces.

courses.title: Drum Essentials for Beginners
courses.description: An introduction to drumming, covering basic rhythms, beats, and techniques.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: Master the art of violin playing with advanced techniques and complex compositions.

courses.title: Saxophone for Intermediate Players
courses.description: Learn to play jazz on the saxophone, with a focus on improvisation and scales.

courses.title: vocals for Intermediate Players
courses.description: Learn to sing vocals with a focus on improvisation and scales.
